name: rebus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a puzzle (= a problem you have to solve) consisting of one or more pictures and sometimes one or more letters or symbols that together represent a word or phrase : A rebus for the word "belief" could be a picture of a bee followed by a picture of a leaf. There was a Sunday newspaper we used to get, and it had a page of kids' puzzles including a rebus.
More examplesFewer examplesWe watched a TV show where contestants had to solve rebuses.A rebus is a puzzle in which symbols or pictures represent words or syllables.He is fully aware of the very ancient tradition of the rebus, the pictorial pun.
